This fix (2017/05/24) is based on code base of V 11.23,
which fix problem of handling fonts without FullName in FontInfo dict.
One sample: txex-bar from newtx font package.

This pack includes BaKoMa\Category\Level2\Font.cat

It should work with version 11.20 ... 11.33

This fix will be applied in V 11.34 and later ...

To apply the fix just unpack 
http://www.bakoma-tex.com/dist/x1123/fix/font-fix170524.zip 
in BaKoMa TeX folder. 

Check that the file
C:\BaKoMa TeX\BaKoMa\Category\Level2\Font.cat
have been replaced.
